input_email_body:
Subject: Urgent: Customer Encountered Problems with Norton Antivirus Plus Installation - Immediate Help Needed

Hello Customer Support Team,

I trust this message finds you in good spirits My name is Fatima Al-Farsi.. I would like to highlight the difficulties faced by <name> when attempting to install Norton Antivirus Plus You can reach me at liuwei@business.cn.. Although the installation instructions were followed carefully, the software seems to be malfunctioning.
Could you kindly provide a swift solution? You can contact <name> at <tel_num> or reply to this email.

I appreciate your quick attention to this issue.

Best regards,
<name>
